vclaim: The NRA sent Wisconsin Supreme Court candidates a letter urging them to submit a "position statement" on gun rights, or risk opposition from NRA members in the state.
title: Did the NRA Ask Judicial Candidates for ‘Position Letters’ on Guns?
subtitle: The National Rifle Association's letters to Wisconsin judicial candidates came under scrutiny in the wake of a mass school shooting in February 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
